name: sanity-template-muna
description: Muna (remember) is a Sanity Studio tieh a data schema for describing and presenting cultural heritage objects.

scripts.export: cd build/studio && sanity dataset export production --types dimensionType,eventType,identifierType,storageType,material,measurementUnit,appelationType,role,language,placeType,technique,textType,conditionType,exhibitionType,workType,objectType,groupType,group ../../data/production.tar.gz
scripts.lint-build: npm run build && (cd build && npm install && npm run lint)
scripts.test: npm run build && cd build && npm install && npm run build

hooks.post-commit: ([ -z "$SKIP_HOOK" ] && sanity-template lockfiles && git add '*package-lock.json*' && git diff --quiet && SKIP_HOOK=1 git commit -m 'Generate lockfiles') && echo 'Committed lockfiles' || echo ''
